charinfo.name: Killer Bee (S)
charinfo.description: Killer Bee (S) is the jinchuuriki from Kumogakure. Bee (S) is referred to as the hero of Kumogakure and possess immense physical strength as well as being an expert swordsman.

abilities.name: Kenjutsu
abilities.description: Killer Bee (S) uses seven swords to give him an offensive defense. Killer Bee (S) will deal 15 piercing damage to any enemy that uses a skill on him for 4 turns. Buzz Saw is improved during this skill.

abilities.name: Buzz Saw
abilities.description: Killer Bee (S) uses Buzz Saw on one enemy dealing 20 piercing damage. This skill will deal double damage and cost 1 additional random chakra when Kenjutsu is in effect.

abilities.name: Chakra Stream
abilities.description: Killer Bee (S) uses Chakra Stream and will counter all enemy non-mental skills used on him for 1 turn. All countered enemies will be dealt 20 piercing damage. This skill is invisible.

abilities.name: Strong Defense
abilities.description: This skill makes Killer Bee (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.
